app_details.title: ML Toolkit
app_details.description: ML Toolkit is designed for MOBA enthusiasts who want to personalize and enhance their gameplay experience. Whether you’re looking to explore hero builds, customize visuals, or optimize your strategy, ML Toolkit brings you a smooth, user-friendly toolset that elevates how you play and enjoy the game.

reviews.content: In my point of view? i think the old app which is "Injector Origin" is more suitable for me, since it has manual inject, which could give me multiple files of heroes skin and just inject it with it without hassle. Though still i like the game effects though, just please bring back the Manual Inject.
reviews.replyContent:
Thanks for the feedback! 🙌
Manual Inject will be added soon, I’m rebuilding it to work smoother and safer with the new system.

I’m glad you like it, and thank you for sticking with the new app. Your feedback really helps shape the updates. 💙🔥

reviews.content: I give it a 1 star because this is the reasson why my Mobile legend got a Virus dont use this apo in first time you download it its great but maybe 3-4 days your experience got a scary Buzzing sound and it wont stop and its became laggy I hate it so much now i will going to delete my ML install it again hayyss dont waste your time in this App and I would like if this app have a Fix bug exactly in ZenHub
